title: marco_kinaa
author: marco_kinaa
content: asic shield most affordable and complete plug and play immersion cooling kit for crypto mining comes with every bit you need to start mining in silence comes with a Dry cooler suitable for Hot and Cold climates comes with different sizes from X6 S19 unit to X40 S19 units with a power load up to 200 KW , single and three phase setupintro video :https://www.reddit.com/r/BitcoinMining/comments/y1bo1n/asic_shield_immersion_cooling_kit_complete/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3Installation and testing https://youtu.be/Gd1gfxvk__gDry cooler connections and installation https://youtu.be/pXwOiR3jTjQfor more details check out the official website :www.asicshield.com

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: As i mentioned in your previous topic announcement in arabic section, the system is good and effective so it’s going to help many miners. The problem with your website now first is registered for only one year  which is a bit suspicious for a big business like that and selling expensive devices and systems, second your domain name informations we find many contradictions, your phone number is American, you name is arabic or indian and the address is Chinese. I might be wrong but we should be carful.Code: Expires On2023-07-05Registered On2022-07-05Updated On2022-07-05Registrant Contact Information:Name Larbi KinaaOrganization kinaa bright limitedAddress room c813 building C, china south city , pinghu ,City shenzhenPostal Code 518000Country CNPhone +1.4159496022

comments.author: marco_kinaa
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on October 12, 2022, 10:42:33 PMAs i mentioned in your previous topic announcement in arabic section, the system is good and effective so it’s going to help many miners. The problem with your website now first is registered for only one year  which is a bit suspicious for a big business like that and selling expensive devices and systems, second your domain name informations we find many contradictions, your phone number is American, you name is arabic or indian and the address is Chinese. I might be wrong but we should be carful.Code: Expires On2023-07-05Registered On2022-07-05Updated On2022-07-05Registrant Contact Information:Name Larbi KinaaOrganization kinaa bright limitedAddress room c813 building C, china south city , pinghu ,City shenzhenPostal Code 518000Country CNPhone +1.4159496022well basing your skeptical on some information you get as a result you two minutes search for domain registration info is totally wrong , if you have done things properly you would have noticed the contact number on the website  matches exchantelly the address , and the company name the domain name registered to matches the location and name of the ownership i don't think its fair to judge something based on a name or a location , you can be from anywhere and own a business somewhere else , that doesn't make you less trustworthy if it was a non legit business , we would've paid for domain name privacy which costs nothing  and you wouldn't even seen the information you posted above , if you are going to investigate something i suggest you do it properly instead of accusing people

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: marco_kinaa on October 12, 2022, 11:41:28 PMwell basing your skeptical on some information you get as a result you two minutes search for domain registration info is totally wrong , if you have done things properly you would have noticed the contact number on the website  matches exchantelly the address , and the company name the domain name registered to matches the location and name of the ownership i don't think its fair to judge something based on a name or a location , you can be from anywhere and own a business somewhere else , that doesn't make you less trustworthy if it was a non legit business , we would've paid for domain name privacy which costs nothing  and you wouldn't even seen the information you posted above , if you are going to investigate something i suggest you do it properly instead of accusing people Now your answer just made me more sure about your scam business, so you saying that my search for your domain name is wrong, yet you say your us phone number matches the chinese address, if you do a simple search for your phone number Code: +1.4159496022You will find it used by a Brazilian iptv service and a Russian old scam oil fraud website. Nothing matches anything based on your domain informations. I warn everyone that intends to buy from this fake store or whatever it is. It’s so unfortunate to see a scam with mining materials, be careful guys and always DYOR

comments.author: marco_kinaa

Nothing matches anything based on your domain informations. I warn everyone that intends to buy from this fake store or whatever it is. It’s so unfortunate to see a scam with mining materials, be careful guys and always DYORyou have a big issue reading english , I never said you shouldn't lookup the domain name ownership and the phone number you talking about is non of ours and that number doesn't even show on other domain lookup website , so double check you finding before accusing other of something you can't even prove  , and the fact that we left the information public it proves that we are legit , as i mentioned in last comment , if we were to hide our company details , then it cost $10 to purchase domain name privacy service , and could you explain the reason calling me a scammer without a proof ? if there anything more secure as an online payment than Credit card and paypal ? how can you call me a scam when customer  are eligible for a refund up to 6 months ? the only thing you showed people here is hate toward others , having no clue what you talking about , trying to police the whole internet , grow up man

It’s so unfortunate to see a scam with mining materials, be careful guys and always DYORwell well well , just did same thing on your website and it turn out its less than 2 months old and your domain expires in less than 10 months , its funny that you are accusing other of a scam , when you are running a scam yourself , at least we are selling physical goods using secure payments , not selling some useless ETH hardfork Pow token with 8 pages white paper that was made by a 12 years old grow up man, find you self real job , trying to scam people here are your website info for everyone to check Registrant   REDACTED FOR PRIVACYRegistrant Org   Efrom Digital ltd.Registrant Country   scRegistrar   Gransy, s.r.o. d/b/a subreg.czIANA ID: 1505URL: http://regtons.comWhois Server: whois.regtons.com(p)Registrar Status   okDates   50 days oldCreated on 2022-08-24Expires on 2023-08-24Updated on 2022-08-29this is pure scam be aware everyone
